name: Data analyst
description:
Our Client - leading international car manufacturer - looking for the Data Analyst in Digital Data department for temporary contract (maternity leave).

Responsibilities:

  • Set up and support of web analytical and other data collection systems (events/data actualization, collection and analysis), digital metrics development
  • New web functionality metrics collection projecting with further effectiveness evaluation
  • Research of data collected and regularities definition, explanation of regularities defined for further optimization and improvement measures
  • Hypothesis building based on analyzed data and tests projecting to prove hypothesis
  • Key metrics definition with prior and post analysis of different activities and projects
  • Consumer journeys analysis, behavioral patterns definition, users segmentation
  • Projects business logic optimization, key metrics improvement
  • Forecasting of key brand metrics based on retrospective data (brand funnel, digital funnel)
  • Key brand metrics tracking and analysis of factors which influence on their performance with further recommendations of KPIs improvement
  • Development and deployment of new data technologies and tools
  • Agency leading
  • Data provision under request
  • Presentations preparation

Requirements:

  • Higher education (Maths, Statistics)
  • Experience in data analysis/data-science minimum 3 years
  • Experience in big data analysis (collect, structure, conclusions visualization)
  • Experience in web analytics systems
  • Understanding of marketing tools basic principles, traffic sources and types

Terms:

  • Fixed salary + Bonus
  • Attractive social package
  • Comfort office near m.Kaluzhskay
